post.text: I love our supporters -- so much spirit! Thank you Cleveland, Ohio --- VOTE TRUMP/PENCE on 11/8/16. Lets WIN & MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Harley
comment.text: Donald you should have your son Barron to explain bots to your supporters. Your stuff is machine generator. Bogus not real, imagination. Vote for Hillary Clinton. The real deal.

replies.author: Rebekka
replies.text: No thanks!!!! Never!!!!! That lying, cheating, corrupt nasty woman will never get my vote! TRUMP/PENCE16

replies.author: Rachel
replies.text: Rebekka She don't need your vote toots. Got Kleenex? You're going to need them, soon.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: I'd die before I voted for Hillary. Of course, after I'm dead something tells me I'd suddenly become a Democrat! ;) Go Trump!
